author: Paul Cullen, Fiach Kelly, Pat Leahy, Vivienne Clarke
title: Coronavirus: Government restricts gatherings to four people, closes non-essential shops
description: Measures extended until March 19th; cafes and restaurants should limit supply to takeaway only
content:
Taoiseach Leo Varadkar has said social gatherings should be restricted to no more than four people in the attempt to combat the coronavirus pandemic.
Speaking at a Government briefing in Dublin, he said restrictions already in place such as school closures h… [+5607 chars]
